CallZText:
ВІДСУТНЄ ГВП. GOOD DAY.
WE HAD A WARNING FROM KYIVENERHO THAT HOT WATER WOULD BE CUT FROM MAY 5TH TO MAY 18TH. I AM WRITING THIS ON MAY 20TH AND THERE IS STILL NO HOT WATER IN OUR BUILDING.
YESTERDAY ”ZHEK” TOLD US WE WOULD GET HOT WATER BACK LAST NIGHT OR TODAY. IT DID NOT HAPPEN YET...
ON TOP OF PAYING MUCH MORE THAN A YEAR AGO, WE NOW GET LESS COMMUNICATION BETWEEN VARIOUS RESPONSIBLE BODIES AND A DROP IN PERFORMANCE.
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR HELP.

FRANCOIS DEMERS
